extDesc.message: Instantly Login GDUF network without a single click!

extInvalidInputAlert.message:
From Extension: 
Invalid username or password, please check again!

description.message: Finally, I got tired of spending three seconds every time I login the campus network. Then I realize it took me hundreds of three seconds to make this extension.

accountStatus.message: Current username and password set to $1 $2

autoCloseTab.message: Automatically close the tab after login is $1

showPassword.message: Show the password in the pop-up menu is $1

detectInBackgroundAndAutoLogin.message: Detect in the background and auto login is $1

autoCloseMessage.message: Automatically close the tab after login

backgroundAutoLogin.message: Detect in the background and auto login

showPasswordOnPopUp.message: Show the password in the pop-up menu

errorSuggestion.message: The error might be caused by the extension, or the campus login server is down.

errorOnRequest.message: From Auto-Login Extension: Failed to send login request, error $1
